# SuperLogs Test Fixtures
# 
# These are sample log lines that the SourceMod plugins will generate.
# The Go parser must handle ALL of these correctly.
#
# Format: EVENT_TYPE|timestamp|gamemode|server_ip|...fields

# ============================================================================
# KILL Events
# Format: KILL|timestamp|gamemode|server_ip|killer_steamid|killer_name|victim_steamid|victim_name|weapon|crit|airborne
# ============================================================================

# Standard kill
KILL|1706745600|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Player1|76561198087654321|Player2|scattergun|0|0

# Critical hit
KILL|1706745601|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Player1|76561198087654321|Player2|rocket_launcher|1|0

# Airshot (airborne victim)
KILL|1706745602|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|SniperPro|76561198087654321|ScoutMain|tf_projectile_pipe_remote|0|1

# Critical airshot
KILL|1706745603|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|DemoGod|76561198087654321|JumpingSoldier|sticky_launcher|1|1

# ============================================================================
# Special Character Tests (Names with pipes, quotes, etc.)
# ============================================================================

# Name with escaped pipe
KILL|1706745604|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Player\\pOne|76561198087654321|NormalName|minigun|0|0

# Name with special characters (escaped)
KILL|1706745605|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|[TF2]\\pBot\\p2000|76561198087654321|l33t\\pplayer|shotgun_primary|0|0

# Name with escaped backslash
KILL|1706745606|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Player\\\\One|76561198087654321|Victim|smg|0|0

# Name with escaped newline (shouldn't happen but test it)
KILL|1706745607|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Multi\\nLine\\nName|76561198087654321|TestPlayer|flamethrower|0|0

# Unicode/emoji in name (if supported)
KILL|1706745608|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|PlayerðŸ˜€|76561198087654321|VictimTest|knife|0|0

# ============================================================================
# Different Weapon Types
# ============================================================================

# Melee
KILL|1706745610|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|SpyMain|76561198087654321|BackstabVictim|knife|0|0

# Projectile
KILL|1706745611|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|SoldierMain|76561198087654321|ScoutTarget|tf_projectile_rocket|0|1

# Headshot (sniper rifle)
KILL|1706745612|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|SniperPro|76561198087654321|HeavyTarget|sniperrifle|1|0

# Sentry gun
KILL|1706745613|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|EngineerMain|76561198087654321|ScoutRusher|obj_sentrygun|0|0

# Taunt kill
KILL|1706745614|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|TauntMaster|76561198087654321|UnluckyVictim|taunt_pyro|0|0

# ============================================================================
# Edge Cases
# ============================================================================

# Very long player names (max 64 chars)
KILL|1706745620|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|ThisIsAVeryLongPlayerNameThatGoesOnAndOnAndOnUpToSixtyFourCharactersExactly|76561198087654321|ShortName|pistol|0|0

# Minimum timestamp
KILL|0|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Player1|76561198087654321|Player2|shotgun_pyro|0|0

# Future timestamp
KILL|2147483647|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|FuturePlayer|76561198087654321|PresentPlayer|scattergun|0|0

# Different server IPs
KILL|1706745621|default|10.0.0.1|76561198012345678|LocalPlayer|76561198087654321|RemotePlayer|medigun|0|0
KILL|1706745622|default|172.16.0.50|76561198012345678|LANPlayer1|76561198087654321|LANPlayer2|syringegun_medic|0|0

# ============================================================================
# DEFLECT Events (Dodgeball)
# Format: DEFLECT|timestamp|gamemode|server_ip|player_steamid|player_name|rocket_speed|deflect_angle|timing_ms|distance
# ============================================================================

# Perfect deflect
DEFLECT|1706745700|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|DodgeballPro|1500.50|1.0000|50|100.00

# Good deflect
DEFLECT|1706745701|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|GoodPlayer|1200.00|0.9500|120|150.25

# Mediocre deflect
DEFLECT|1706745702|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|OkayPlayer|800.00|0.7500|200|200.00

# Close-range deflect
DEFLECT|1706745703|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|CloseDeflector|1800.00|0.9800|30|50.00

# Far-range deflect
DEFLECT|1706745704|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|FarDeflector|900.00|0.8500|180|500.00

# Very fast rocket
DEFLECT|1706745705|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|SpeedDeflector|2500.00|0.9900|25|75.00

# Slow rocket
DEFLECT|1706745706|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|SlowDeflector|600.00|0.8000|250|120.00

# Edge case: Zero distance (shouldn't happen but test)
DEFLECT|1706745707|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|ZeroDistance|1000.00|1.0000|100|0.00

# Edge case: Perfect angle, slow timing
DEFLECT|1706745708|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|PerfectAngle|1000.00|1.0000|500|100.00

# Special character in name
DEFLECT|1706745709|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Player\\pWithPipe|1100.00|0.9200|150|110.00

# ============================================================================
# MATCH Events
# ============================================================================

# Match start
MATCH_START|1706745800|default|192.168.1.100|cp_process_final

# Match start with special map name
MATCH_START|1706745801|default|192.168.1.100|koth_product_rcX

# Match start with escaped characters
MATCH_START|1706745802|default|192.168.1.100|custom\\pmap\\p2024

# Match end - RED wins
MATCH_END|1706745900|default|192.168.1.100|2|600

# Match end - BLU wins
MATCH_END|1706745901|default|192.168.1.100|3|450

# Match end - TIE
MATCH_END|1706745902|default|192.168.1.100|0|300

# Match end - very short match
MATCH_END|1706745903|default|192.168.1.100|2|10

# Match end - very long match
MATCH_END|1706745904|default|192.168.1.100|3|3600

# ============================================================================
# Gamemode Variations
# ============================================================================

# Dodgeball gamemode
KILL|1706746000|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|DodgeballPlayer|76561198087654321|RocketVictim|tf_projectile_rocket|0|1

# MGE gamemode
KILL|1706746001|mge|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|MGEPlayer1|76561198087654321|MGEPlayer2|rocket_launcher|0|0

# Ultiduo gamemode
KILL|1706746002|ultiduo|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|UltiduoSoldier|76561198087654321|UltiduoMedic|scattergun|0|0

# ============================================================================
# Stress Test - Rapid Events
# ============================================================================

# 10 rapid kills (1 second apart)
KILL|1706746100|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|RapidKiller1|76561198087654321|Victim1|scattergun|0|0
KILL|1706746101|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|RapidKiller2|76561198087654321|Victim2|scattergun|0|0
KILL|1706746102|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|RapidKiller3|76561198087654321|Victim3|scattergun|0|0
KILL|1706746103|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|RapidKiller4|76561198087654321|Victim4|scattergun|0|0
KILL|1706746104|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|RapidKiller5|76561198087654321|Victim5|scattergun|0|0
KILL|1706746105|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|RapidKiller6|76561198087654321|Victim6|scattergun|0|0
KILL|1706746106|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|RapidKiller7|76561198087654321|Victim7|scattergun|0|0
KILL|1706746107|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|RapidKiller8|76561198087654321|Victim8|scattergun|0|0
KILL|1706746108|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|RapidKiller9|76561198087654321|Victim9|scattergun|0|0
KILL|1706746109|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|RapidKiller10|76561198087654321|Victim10|scattergun|0|0

# ============================================================================
# Malformed/Invalid Lines (Parser Should Handle Gracefully)
# ============================================================================

# Missing fields (should be rejected)
KILL|1706746200|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678

# Extra fields (should ignore extras)
KILL|1706746201|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Player1|76561198087654321|Player2|scattergun|0|0|extra|fields|here

# Unknown event type (should skip)
UNKNOWN_EVENT|1706746202|default|192.168.1.100|data|more|data

# Empty line (should skip)


# Line with only separators
||||||||

# Invalid timestamp (non-numeric)
KILL|not_a_number|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Player1|76561198087654321|Player2|scattergun|0|0

# ============================================================================
# Real-World Examples (Based on Actual TF2 Gameplay)
# ============================================================================

# Competitive 6v6 scenario
MATCH_START|1706746300|default|192.168.1.100|cp_process_final
KILL|1706746310|default|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Scout_Main|76561198087654321|Roamer_Soldier|scattergun|0|0
KILL|1706746315|default|192.168.1.100|76561198011111111|Demo_Main|76561198022222222|Pocket_Soldier|sticky_launcher|0|0
KILL|1706746320|default|192.168.1.100|76561198033333333|Medic_Main|76561198044444444|Scout_Flank|ubersaw|1|0
MATCH_END|1706746900|default|192.168.1.100|2|600

# Dodgeball match
MATCH_START|1706747000|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|tfdb_map_v1
DEFLECT|1706747010|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Pro_Pyro_1|1200.00|0.9500|100|120.00
DEFLECT|1706747015|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198087654321|Pro_Pyro_2|1400.00|0.9800|80|100.00
DEFLECT|1706747020|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Pro_Pyro_1|1600.00|0.9900|60|90.00
KILL|1706747025|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|76561198012345678|Pro_Pyro_1|76561198087654321|Pro_Pyro_2|tf_projectile_rocket|0|0
MATCH_END|1706747200|dodgeball|192.168.1.100|2|200
